events.message: I recently purchased a jacket from your store, but I want to request a refund because it does not fit as expected and I would like to return it.
The customer's message contains keywords indicating a refund request, so the issue has been categorized under 'Refund'.
The case has been assigned to agent Jessica M. who specializes in returns and refunds.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us about your refund request. I'd be happy to assist you with the return process.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm that the jacket is unused and in original packaging to proceed with the refund?
Sure, my order number is 82497531, and I have not worn the jacket. It's still in the original packaging with all tags attached.

Thank you for the information. You may return the jacket using the prepaid shipping label which we will email to you shortly. Once we receive it, a full refund will be processed within 5 business days.
Thanks for the quick response! I appreciate the easy return process and look forward to receiving the shipping label.
The return instructions and prepaid shipping label have been sent. This completes the refund process initiation for your order.
Just following up to confirm you have received the prepaid label and to check if you need any further assistance with the return and refund.
Yes, I got the label and sent the jacket back yesterday. Thank you for your help throughout this process.
We have received the returned jacket and processed your refund. The amount should appear in your account within 3-5 business days.
Your case has been closed successfully since the refund has been processed. Please contact us again if you need further assistance.
We have sent you a short survey to rate your satisfaction with our refund and return service. Your feedback is important to us.
